column5: 29 days from now, we will heading up the 105 to Ear Falls. Any reports on how the roads are? Central Il. had a rough winter and our roads took a beating, it seems Ontario had a long winter, how are the roads holding up? Thanks in advance!
Thanks Tackleman, any word on the ice-out for Ear Falls area?
Is the ice gone on Gull rock yet?
South Bay on gullrock is 1/2 open with a south wind blowing the ice onto the shore away from the tourist camp (and my dock) if it keeps up tonight, we should be ice free in another day or so.
south bay is 3/4 open, golden hook bay is open, should be gone in the next day or so.
Anyone have an update on the road? Is it in good shape, any construction? Thanks 13 days to go
